ygData.subject: Re: level 20+ warriors?
ygData.msgSnippet: Strange, I m 28th and hitting for 44 with the BBC, dark elf. ... From: Jeff Lynch  I play a 31st level warrior on Povar and here is
ygData.messageBody:
Strange, I'm 28th and hitting for 44 with the BBC, dark elf.

>>> "Jeff Lynch" <jlynch13@...> 5.24.99 3:32:13 PM >>>
From: "Jeff Lynch" <jlynch13@...>


I play a 31st level warrior on Povar and here is what I have found...
using my BBC at level 20 I was doing max of 35 per hit.... At 30 I have been
hitting 45... Looks something like 1 extra damage per level... and my
strength is 104 (halflling)...

I also know a 40th troll SK with a giant zweildhander... dam 18 delay 39...
and he hits for 65 at max.... not sure what his strength is though :(


Eogun
